episodes.title: Obito to Madara
episodes.plot: Madara has rescued a dying Obito and tells him about his plans.

episodes.title: Ore wa jigoku ni iru
episodes.plot: Two White Zetsu helps Obito in his rehabilitation, while they explain more about Madara's plan and bring some news regarding Rin and Kakashi.

episodes.title: Yume no sekai
episodes.plot: Obito watches in disbelief as Kakashi kills Rin. Unable to accept the harsh reality, Obito decides to carry out Madara's dream so that he can create an ideal world where Rin still exists.

episodes.title: Shinobiyoru kage
episodes.plot: Years ago, Yahiko, Nagato, and Konan form the Akatsuki to realize their dream of bringing peace to the Hidden Rain.

episodes.title: Shinsei: "Akatsuki"
episodes.plot: Danzo deliberately misleads Hanzo, telling him that the Akatsuki are attempting to sabotage the peace talks between the Hidden Rain and Stone.

episodes.title: Kokoro o kakusu men
episodes.plot: After the end of the Third Great Ninja War, the Leaf Village is divided over who should become the next Hokage. Minato Namikaze is soon appointed as the Fourth Hokage, much to the annoyance of Danzo and Orochimaru

episodes.title: Minato no shi
episodes.plot: Kakashi becomes part of the ANBU Black Ops, an elite team of shinobi who are under the direct command of the Fourth Hokage, Minato Namikaze.

episodes.title: Hashirama saibô
episodes.plot: At the Foundation, Kakashi meets a boy who uses Wood Style, a jutsu that only First Hokage Hashirama was capable of using. Kakashi goes to Third Hokage Hiruzen's library to seek answers and discovers records regarding Hashirama's cells.

episodes.title: Nukenin: Orochimaru
episodes.plot: Orochimaru is forced to flee the Hidden Leaf after Third Hokage Hiruzen exposes his illegal experiments. Danzo, fearing that Orochimaru's capture would lead to the exposure of his own involvement in the experiments, sends out one of his men to help the rogue ninja.

episodes.title: Orochimaru no jikkentai
episodes.plot: While pursuing Orochimaru, Kakashi wanders into a village inhabited by the Iburi Clan, a group of people with the unique ability to turn into smoke. Kakashi is soon captured and learns that the villagers all serve under Orochimaru.

episodes.title: Sorezore no michi
episodes.plot: Yukimi leaves the village to see the outside world, taking "Tenzo" with her. Kakashi tries to convince the two to return so that he can set a trap to capture Orochimaru, who is after Yukimi's blood. But Yamato, who has grown attached to Yukimi, abandons his original mission to protect his friend.

episodes.title: Nerawareta Sharingan
episodes.plot: Danzo orders Tenzo to kill Kakashi and take his Sharingan. Reluctant at first, Tenzo decides to carry out his orders after learning that the Leaf Shinobi has come to be known as "Kakashi the Friend Killer."

episodes.title: Konoha no Shinobi
episodes.plot: After being saved by the target he was ordered to kill, Tenzo realizes that the man known as "Kakashi the Friend Killer" is someone who values the lives of his comrades more than anyone. No longer wishing to kill Kakashi, Tenzo abandons the mission and returns to the Leaf Village, fully aware that his actions will stir up Danzo's anger.

episodes.title: ANBU no Uchiha
episodes.plot: Itachi Uchiha is inducted into Kakashi's unit as the youngest member of the ANBU Black Ops. Itachi's father, Fugaku, is pleased, thinking this will grant the Uchiha access to exclusive, top-secret Leaf intel. But Danzo, who wants intel on the Uchiha, orders Itachi to betray his family and clan by acting as a double agent.

episodes.title: Kûdetâ
episodes.plot: Following the aftermath of the Nine-Tails incident, many on the Leaf Council voice suspicions that the Uchiha Clan were behind this tragedy. The Uchiha are then placed under 24-hour surveillance by the ANBU, which causes further tensions to arise.

episodes.title: Sangeki no yoru
episodes.plot: Kakashi visits the Uchiha District and notices that the community seems more antisocial than the last time he visited. Meanwhile Itachi finds concrete evidence regarding the Uchiha Clan's coup against the Leaf. The fateful moment is fast approaching...

episodes.title: Tantô Jônin
episodes.plot: Hiruzen relieves Kakashi of his ANBU duties and assigns him a new position as a Jonin Leader. Reflecting on his past mistakes, Kakashi decides to use the same test that Minato once used to measure one's teamwork.

episodes.title: Dai nana han
episodes.plot: Hiruzen assigns Kakashi to be in charge of Naruto, Sasuke, and Sakura, three genin that bear a striking resemblance to the former Team Minato.

episodes.title: Kakashi no ketsui
episodes.plot: Kakashi desperately tries to reach out to Obito, but his words fall on deaf ears. Obito instead accuses Kakashi of being trash, which angers Naruto, forcing him to step in and defend his Sensei.

episodes.title: Shinobi rengô-gun no jutsu!
episodes.plot: The barrier is shattered, and Ten Tails appears! With unfathomable power in its attack, it sends shock waves through the air! Kurama takes the lead and tries to go on the offensive, but is helpless against Ten Tails' immense strength. Soon both Kurama and Gyuki exhaust their chakra and fade away.

episodes.title: Tsunagareru mono
episodes.plot: The Allied Shinobi Forces begin their onslaught against Obito and Madara. But Ten Tails suddenly transforms and hurls powerful Tailed Beast Bombs toward distant towns. One after the other, the Tailed Beast Bombs find their targets. The shinobi wonder why Ten Tails is aiming so far away as one of the bombs heads toward HQ!.

episodes.title: Shinobimau mono-tachi
episodes.plot: Naruto is overcome with grief over Neji's death, but Hinata's words restore his fighting spirit. Shikaku outlines his final strategy before he dies, in which Nine Tails will send its chakra to increase everyone's strength. United in their cause, Naruto and the shinobi set out to take on Ten Tails, determined that Neji and their comrades will not have died in vain!

episodes.title: Subete o shiru mono-tachi
episodes.plot: Sasuke returns to the Hidden Leaf Village seeking answers, and standing before him are First Hokage Hashirama, Second Hokage Tobirama, Third Hokage Hiruzen, and Fourth Hokage Minato, all reanimated. Sasuke asks Hiruzen for the truth about Itachi, and he questions Tobirama about the secret of the Uchiha Clan. Then Hashirama begins his story, which goes back to the feudal age, to a period before the village even existed.

episodes.title: Hashirama to Madara
episodes.plot: Villages did not exist when Hashirama was a child. It was during this strife-filled time that he met Madara Uchiha. The two youths talk about their hopes for the future, without revealing their true identities, and find they share the same vision...to create a ninja world where children do not have to die.

episodes.title: Sengoku jidai
episodes.plot: Madara and Hashirama eventually become the leaders of their respective clans. As the fighting rages on between the Senju and Uchiha, Hashirama approaches Madara about an alliance. But Madara refuses to listen and releases Susano'o instead!

episodes.title: Hontô no yume
episodes.plot: The Senju and Uchiha clans join together to build a shinobi village and fulfill their dreams. Standing on the cliff where they confided their youthful aspirations to each other, Hashirama and Madara gaze over the forest at their burgeoning village. Hashirama decides that Madara should be the Hokage, but his younger brother Tobirama objects, warning that the Uchiha are dangerous.

episodes.title: Sasuke no kotae
episodes.plot: After listening to what Hashirama and the rest of the former Hokage have to say, Sasuke finally understands how the Leaf Village and its shinobi came to be. He then decides on the path he will ultimately take!

episodes.title: Kazaana
episodes.plot: The fighting rages between Naruto, who stands at the vanguard of the Allied Shinobi Forces, and the team of Madara and Obito. Ten Tails' relentless attack is wearing down Naruto, and his chakra begins to dissipate. Meanwhile, Kakashi and Obito face each other in a different Kamui dimension.

episodes.title: Umeru mono
episodes.plot: Ten Tails is on the brink of its final transformation and begins to form a massive Tailed Beast Bomb. The shinobi no longer have the strength or energy left to stop it, but Sakura, Shikamaru and the others refuse to give up. Shikamaru formulates a plan to combine the strength of the shinobi to block the Tailed Beast Bomb, but it proves too powerful. Right at that moment, Minato, who was revived with the Reanimation Jutsu, comes to the rescue!

episodes.title: Dai nana han, shûketsu!!
episodes.plot: Team 7 is finally reunited when Naruto, Sakura and Sasuke join forces. Then the reanimated former Hokage arrive to add their strength to a counteroffensive. Ten Tails divides into countless parts, and Naruto and Sasuke charge at them. Refusing to be left behind, Sakura follows!

episodes.title: Aratanaru sansukumi
episodes.plot: Bearing a close resemblance to the Legendary Sannin, Naruto, Sakura and Sasuke make a stunning arrival on the battlefield with each of their summonings.

episodes.title: Kakashi VS Obito
episodes.plot: Kakashi and Obito face again in an epic fight to give birth to a new evil.

episodes.title: Kyûbi gôdatsu shirei
episodes.plot: The townspeople are going about their daily business on the streets of the Leaf Village when someone suddenly appears and starts sending them flying.

episodes.title: Naruto tai Meka Naruto
episodes.plot: The townspeople are going about their daily business on the streets of the Leaf Village when someone suddenly appears and starts sending them flying.

episodes.title: Jûbi no Jinchûriki
episodes.plot: Obito completely absorbs the giant Ten Tails, undergoes a transformation and becomes the Ten Tails' Jinchuriki.

episodes.title: Toppakô
episodes.plot: Obito has gained complete control over his power as the Ten Tails Jinchuriki as his powerful, cold-blooded attacks force Naruto and his friends into a corner.

episodes.title: Naruto ga umareta hi
episodes.plot: As Minato confronts Obito he becomes full of regret.

episodes.title: Shinju
episodes.plot: Naruto and Minato combine their powers to perform a Sage Jutsu attack on Obito.

episodes.title: Shinobi no yume
episodes.plot: The Ten Tails morphs into its final form, "The Divine Tree," and attacks the shinobi, absorbing their chakra one after another.

episodes.title: Saki o ou
episodes.plot: Naruto's past, thoughts, and feelings flow into the consciousness of every shinobi, unifying their hearts.

episodes.title: Nakama de michita kokoro
episodes.plot: Naruto and Sasuke size up Obito as the final battle looms.

episodes.title: Uchiha Obito
episodes.plot: Naruto objects to Obito's claim that he is the second Sage of Six Paths and declares that he is Obito Uchiha.

episodes.title: Chanto miteru
episodes.plot: Pressed by Naruto, Obito remembers the time he, Kakashi, and Rin teamed up for the Chunin Exam and when he promised Rin that he would become Hokage.

episodes.title: Mamorareta yakusoku
episodes.plot: Naruto's power of persuasion moves Obito's heart.

episodes.title: Saisho no tomo
episodes.plot: Gaara tells the story of how Naruto and he became friends.

episodes.title: Akogare no Nê-Sama
episodes.plot: The Hyuga Clan, in which the side branch family exists solely to protect the main family, has a legacy of hatred and division. Hanabi adores her sister Hinata, who struggles to become a worthy successor to the Hyuga Clan.

episodes.title: Hanabi no ketsui
episodes.plot: Hanabi begins training in order to be strong and kind like Hinata. But when Hinata is labeled unfit as a successor, Hanabi's heart becomes bound to her destiny.

episodes.title: Uchiha Madara, tatsu
episodes.plot: Naruto and the Allied Shinobi Forces successfully extract the Tailed Beasts from Obito. Only Madara remains, and Naruto heads out to tackle this foe.

episodes.title: Ura no kokoro
episodes.plot: With his newly revived strength, Madara doesn't give in against the nine Tailed Beasts.

episodes.title: Hontô no owari
episodes.plot: Despite all efforts, Kurama is extracted from Naruto, and ultimately, all the Tailed Beasts are imprisoned inside the Gedo Statue.

episodes.title: Ninja Escapades: The Far Reaches of Hope
episodes.plot: The townspeople are going about their daily business on the streets of the Leaf Village when someone suddenly appears and starts sending them flying.

episodes.title: Sunny Side Battle!
episodes.plot: The townspeople are going about their daily business on the streets of the Leaf Village when someone suddenly appears and starts sending them flying.
